name: places/ChIJyUwNAfhYwokRo1IBVK6rLlU
formattedAddress: 133 W 72nd St #703, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 133 W 72nd St #703, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
Gabbi was such a pleasure to work with! She customized nutrition and fitness plans for me and put so much time and effort into coaching me and helping me reach my goals. I felt 100% supported from the moment I signed with her, and the fact that my insurance covered her was a wonderful bonus!

As someone who eats plant based, it's hard for me to get protein for building muscle, but Gabbi was able to customize meal plans for me with no problems, ensuring I got enough complete plant proteins, fats, complex carbohydrates, and vitamins to fuel me all day. She took all the guesswork out of what I should eat and when so I could just focus on my goals, which was a load off my mind, as I tend to stress about calories, meal choices, and food.

I had a knee injury from running that I'd been seeing a physical therapist for, but Gabbi's exercises helped me more effectively and in a much shorter time than weeks of physical therapy did. I also noticed a massive increase in overall strength and physical fitness within a few short weeks of beginning to work with Gabbi. She was able to tailor exercises to the equipment I already had available in my home gym, which saved me from having to join an expensive gym or having to buy anything. Years later, I still use her workout plans. I highly recommend her!

originalText.text:
I have known Gabbi for a few years now and her work with me has been amazing. Not only is she knowledgeable in her fields of dietetics and exercise training, she is also the most kind, caring, and compassionate human being who is invested in you.

I have so much good to say about my experiences with her. She will spend time with you during sessions, going out of her way to accommodate your schedule, follow up with you and follow through with her guidance.

In my time working with Gabbi, she has made a long lasting and positive impact on my health and mental well-being. I am so appreciative to have found her. You will be too.

originalText.text: I've worked with Gabbi for almost three years and have loved having her as a support. Gabbi has always kept me sane in my approach to eating and exercise, while still giving me amazing results. As someone who has struggled with eating in a balanced way for years, working with Gabbi has allowed me to realize that I don't need to starve to be a healthy weight, nor do I need to run for miles. Gabbi has changed the way I structure my meals, and transformed the way I exercise. After working with Gabbi, I've never been stronger, nor have I felt more confident in my body.

originalText.text: Personal attention, a program personally tailored to individual needs, and utmost consideration for any challenges faced on the road to wellness is what Gabbi Berkow is all about! Her guidance and attention to detail abounds in a program that will get you on the road to achieving personal goals and fitness. That program is a comprehensive overview of what you will need to do and supports every aspect of how to go about doing it. I have developed a deeper understanding of nutrition thanks to Gabbi, that,  along with a workout regime that strengthens and builds has made an overall improvement on my quality of life! Gabbi knows how to balance personal with professional, a quality much appreciated in the quest for health. She educates, encourages, and builds awareness, an experience I value greatly. Gabbi has provided me with all the tools I need, and as a client my part is to use them consistently!! I am grateful for the clarity and encouragement she has provided. Thank You Gabbi!!!

originalText.text:
I came to Gabbi looking for a dietitian to help me with my autoimmune disease (lupus) and to help with
my digestion issues. Since working with both Gabbi and her associate Rakhi for the last 6 months, I have
noticed such tremendous and sustainable improvements in my energy, mood, symptoms, digestion,
exercise regimen, inflammation, and ability to stay on track with eating healthy and working out regularly.

My lupus and Raynaud’s Syndrome symptoms, which used to be triggered even in warmer temperatures,
don’t bother me as much anymore. One of the best things is that my daily mood and energy have
improved so much—this is actually something I have struggled with for years, and I am truly amazed by
how the diet/supplements helped with this! Gabbi and Rakhi also helped me figure out my digestive
triggers and now my stomach doesn’t hurt anymore. It was great that Rakhi was able to relate and share
from her own personal experiences with autoimmunity and make recommendations from her expertise.
She really kept me accountable with our regular meetings and helped me to clean up my diet!

Gabbi also generously created a weekly lifting routine for me that was personalized for my injuries,
schedule, available equipment, and areas of focus. It was so comprehensive! I feel safe and confident
following it.

Gabbi is so responsive, compassionate, and encouraging. I feel like she really cares about my health and
is personally invested with me in reaching my health goals. She kindly answered all my questions (no
matter how naive I was about health things!) and always looked into anything that stood out to her when
there were concerning changes in my health/bloodwork. She even helped me coordinate with my doctors
to get the appropriate tests and ask the right questions. I appreciate how invested she has been in
helping me to figure out my inflammation triggers.

I am also really grateful that Gabbi takes health insurance, which seems uncommon for RDs. She took
care of verifying my insurance coverage, emailing me my benefits, and relieving me of any out of pocket
costs.

I can confidently say that I eat healthier every day. I don’t even have daily cravings for unhealthy food
anymore, and I feel that my nutrition and exercise regimens are actually sustainable. I also work out
regularly now—something I haven’t done in years.

I’ve learned so much about what actual healthy eating is and how different aspects of lifestyle can affect
my overall health. I feel empowered to continue living healthier. I’m really grateful for Gabbi and Rakhi’s
kindness, education, patience, and for keeping me accountable to my health goals. Highly recommend!
